Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IRoom, Eamon, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.7.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Stronghold Entrance

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Heavy stonework adorns this grand and imposing entrance hewn into the side of the mountain. Stone gargoyles cast a menacing glare at those who dare to enter. **001

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Stronghold Entryway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room's smooth stone walls are lined with sconces that provide ample light. A tall statue of some great warrior, long dead, stands in the middle of the room. **002

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Grand Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a long, wide hallway that gently slopes down to the north. Niches in the walls hold man-sized statues of great warriors and nobles long past. **003

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Welcome Hall

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Ornate sconces illuminate every facet of this room. Great tapestries, now in tatters, hang from the ceiling and cover the smoothly hewn walls. There was once fine furniture in this room, but most of it has been smashed. **004

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Doorwardens' Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An aged wooden desk is situated against the north wall. A rack that once held weapons is bolted to the west wall but the weapons have long since been pilfered. A heavy storage locker, made of iron, lies in the northwest corner. **005

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Grand Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a long, wide hallway that gently slopes down to the north. The stone walls are lined with lit sconces. **006

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Entry Parlor

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room is a medium-sized square hall. It is plain but well-lit by sconces. **007

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This hall was probably once a spectacular gallery for artwork, but it is now in ruin. Statues, many broken or defaced, line the north and south walls. A few shattered remnants of artwork such as pottery and sculpture lie strewn about the room. **008

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a plain, narrow hallway with low ceilings. The smooth stones walls are scorched and scarred as if a terrible battle had been fought here. **009

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Cloak Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A few tattered rags, once expensive coats, lie about on the floor, but otherwise this area has been picked clean. Affixed wooden pegs line all four walls of this room. **010

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room is strewn with bookshelves that have been tipped over. The floor is littered with tattered pages and rotten books. Desks in the middle of the room have been knocked over or smashed. **011

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a long, narrow hallway with a low ceiling that runs north and south. A single sconce provides minimal illumination. **012

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Storage Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room is heavily cluttered with worthless junk and various detritus is strewn about the floor. **013

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Administrative Office

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room appears to have been some sort of planning office. There are rotten papers strewn about the room and faded maps affixed to the walls. A formerly grand desk has been hacked to pieces. A wooden cabinet stands against the east wall. **014

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Grand Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a long, wide hallway that runs north and south. The stone walls are lined with ornate sconces and feature detailed engravings made by a very skilled artisan. **015

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a large room with high ceilings. A formerly beautiful rug, now threadbare and rotten, covers most of the smooth stone floor of this room. Ornate sconces thoroughly bathe this room in light. **016

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Throne Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room was once decadently furnished but anything of value has long since been stolen. A huge throne sits upon a high dais against the west wall. The throne was once encrusted with fine gems but they have all been pried loose. **017

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: King's Quarters

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A bed frame, stripped of all accoutrements, lies against the north wall. A very large armoire rests against the west wall. **018

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room was once a wizard's lab for conducting experiments. Tables, most of which are broken or overturned, are scattered about the room. The floor is covered with shattered glass vials as well as strange devices covered in magical runes. **019

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: King's Private Sitting Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A small table with a broken leg and few worn couches are all that remain of a room that was once lavishly furnished. **020

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a long hallway that runs east and west. **021

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Soldiers' Quarters

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here there are numerous wooden bunk beds haphazardly arranged. Most of the bunks have a blanket and pillow on them. There is a rather foul odor in this room and it is clear from the various supplies lying about that this room is still being used. **022

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Soldiers' Dining Hall

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A vast table spans the length of this room. Various utensils and goblets are scattered about the table, all of poor quality. It is apparent that this room is meant as the mess hall for soldiers and staff. **023

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a large room with high ceilings and numerous sconces on the walls creating a very bright light. There are food preparation tables along the walls and in the middle. Various kitchen utensils and cooking supplies are scattered about. **024

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Grand Dining Hall

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Most of the fine decor of this room has been smashed or stolen. Any valuable goblets or utensils are long gone. The huge dining table that spans the room has been stripped bare of linens and now serves only as a mess table. **025

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a short, wide hallway that runs east and west. **026

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a large chamber filled with rusty armor and weapons. None of it is valuable or suitable for use in combat. **027

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Conjuring Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a huge chamber with walls made of black stone, scorched and scarred by magic. Summoning runes are carved into the floor in various geometrical patterns. There are several heavy iron cages in this room, now empty. **028

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Stair

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is very a steep, narrow stone stair that leads up and down.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wizard's Spire

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone balcony perched atop a spire that protrudes from the side of the mountain. From here, you can see all of the town and valley below. Surrounded by trees and shrubbery, this perch is well-camouflaged from viewers in the valley below. **030

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Cave Entry Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a small, dark chamber. The walls here are roughly hewn and covered with moss and lichen. **031

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Natural Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This natural tunnel runs north and south with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Natural Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a small natural cavern with dark tunnels leading away to the north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Natural Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This natural tunnel runs north and south with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Smelly Natural Cavern

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a large natural cavern with dark tunnels leading away to the south, east and west. There is a particularly foul odor here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Short Broken Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This broken tunnel, choked with loose rock, runs east and west with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Natural Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a small natural cavern with dark tunnels leading away to the north and east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Natural Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This natural tunnel runs north and south with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Natural Cavern

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a small natural cavern with tunnels leading away to the west and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Short Broken Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This short broken tunnel runs north and south with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Natural Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a large natural cavern with tunnels leading away to the south and east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Natural Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This long natural tunnel runs east and west with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Natural Cavern

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a large natural cavern with tunnels leading away to the south and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Short Broken Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This broken tunnel, choked with loose rock, runs north and south with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Natural Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a small natural cavern with tunnels leading away to the north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Natural Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This broken tunnel, choked with loose rock, runs north and south with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Natural Cavern

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a huge natural cavern with tunnels leading away to the north, east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Short Natural Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This short natural tunnel, choked with disgorged rock, runs east and west with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Natural Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a large natural cavern with tunnels leading away to the east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Short Natural Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This short natural tunnel runs east and west with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Broken Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This long natural tunnel, clotted with disgorged rock, runs east and west with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Natural Cavern

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a small natural cavern with a dark tunnel leading away to the west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Broken Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This long natural tunnel, choked with disgorged rock, runs east and west with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Natural Cavern

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a small chamber with roughly hewn walls. Dark tunnels lead away to the north and east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Natural Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This long natural tunnel runs north and south with exits on either end. You can see a shimmering light to the north.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Necromancer's Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This massive chamber is illuminated by heavy magical candelabras. The walls, roughly hewn in the rock, are covered with evil magical runes written in blood. A large altar with bowls of blood upon it is situated against the north wall. **029

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Natural Tunnel

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This long natural tunnel runs east and west with exits on either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Natural T-Intersection

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This T-intersection has dark natural tunnels leading away to the east and west. A huge stair, roughly hewn and heavily scarred from battle, leads down into the darkness.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Great Hewn Stair

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This great stair is steep and treacherous. Loose rock scattered about threatens anyone attempting to climb it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Hewn Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room, crudely hewn into the rock, is littered with the bones and debris of some long-fought battle. A great stone stair leads up and a wide corridor leads west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Hewn Corridor

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This roughly-hewn corridor leads east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Hewn Entry Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This huge entry chamber has been swept clean. The walls are carved with the exotic designs of a master stonemason. **032

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Edge Of Steep Cliff

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This high ledge overlooks an enclosed valley below. Snowcapped mountains surround the valley and there appears to be no pass out. The valley is almost completely filled with a very dark and ominous looking forest. **033

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Steep Winding Stone Path

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This crudely-fashioned stone path is narrow and steep. It leads up to the cliff and down into the valley below.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in the woods, near the entrance. The dirt path is well-worn and lined with stones to create a clear walkway. You dare not step off the path. The path runs north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Clearing In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This large clearing is lined with stones. The forest is eerily quiet with no sounds of birds or other animals. Paths lead north, south, and east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Clearing In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This small clearing is lined with stones. Paths lead north and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Clearing In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This large clearing is lined with stones. A path leads south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Clearing In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This small clearing is lined with stones. Paths lead north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: 4-Way Intersection In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here stone-lined dirt paths run in all four directions.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: T-Intersection In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here stone-lined dirt paths run north, east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: T-Intersection In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Here stone-lined dirt paths run north, south and east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Clearing In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This large clearing is lined with stones. A small brook bisects this clearing. A narrow stone bridge, covered in green moss, arches over the brook. Paths lead east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Clearing In Woods With Pit

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This small clearing is lined with stones. In the center of the clearing is a large pit. You cannot tell how deep it is since the bottom is dark and beyond your sight. A path leads west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Clearing In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This large clearing is lined with stones. There is a curious yellow plant with heavy thorns that grows in patches here. A path leads south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Clearing In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This large clearing is lined with stones. A small brook, dotted with water lilies, runs through the clearing. A narrow stone bridge, covered in moss, spans the brook. Paths lead north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Clearing In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This small clearing is lined with stones. Paths lead north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Clearing In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A beautiful marble fountain stands in the center of this clearing. **034

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Path In Woods

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a stone-lined dirt path that runs north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Edge Of Tangledoom Forest

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The stone-paved path widens a bit here. It leads north into the forest where it turns into a dirt path. In the opposite direction, the path leads back up the mountain.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Treasure Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This small chamber has only the secret exit to the south. You can tell this room was used as a treasury based on its contents.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Low-Ceilinged Natural Cavern

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This stark chamber appears to have been excavated by some large burrowing creature. Claw marks can be seen all around. Only a tiny sliver of light shines in from a large hole in the ceiling. **036

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Narrow Burrow

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This small burrowed-out tunnel is clearly the work of some large creature. You can barely squeeze through it. The tunnel runs north and south with exits either end.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Top Of Massive Stonework Stairs

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This area looks to have collapsed many years ago. It is covered with broken stone and rubble. Some of the stone fragments appear to have once been an enormous statue of some great and terrible demon. **037

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Base Of Massive Stonework Stairs

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This area appears to be part of a demonic temple. Iron sconces, twisted into the shapes of horrific demon-like creatures, provide dim illumination. Tapestries on the walls depict vile events of destruction and ritual sacrifice. **038

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wide E/W Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This hallway is hewn from rock and features strange symbols carved on the walls.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Skeletons' Lair

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room is completely swept clean. Sconces mounted on the walls bathe the room in magical flickering light. Like the outer hallway, the walls are covered with arcane symbols. **039

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wide E/W Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This hallway is hewn from rock and features strange symbols carved on the walls. A foul odor emanates from the west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Zombies' Lair

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room is covered in debris and filth and the stench is almost unbearable. The stone walls feature intricate carvings and arcane symbols. **040

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wide N/S Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This hallway is hewn from rock and features strange symbols carved on the walls. A foul odor emanates from the north.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Hydra's Lair

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This plain chamber features elaborate symbols and carvings on the smooth stone walls. The faint flicker of the magical sconces provides an eerie illumination. **041

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wide E/W Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This hallway is hewn from rock and features strange symbols carved on the walls.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wraiths' Lair

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This chamber features arcane symbols and unsettling carvings on the stone walls. The dim flicker of the magical sconces provides illumination. **042

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wide N/S Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Like all the hallways in this strange temple, there are curious symbols carved on the walls.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Narthex

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This large vestibule features the same wicked carvings on the walls. Tapestries, clearly very old, hang from the high ceiling. A fountain in the center of the chamber is now dry and choked with dust. **043

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wide E/W Hallway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This hallway is hewn from rock and features strange symbols carved on the walls.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Temple Sanctuary

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This massive chamber has great vaulted ceilings supported by enormous columns. Stained glass, artificially backlit by magic, surrounds the room. A large altar can be seen against the south wall. Upon it are two candelabras and a large ancient **078

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
